functions.name: ceil
functions.description: Ceil returns the least integer value greater than or equal to input

functions.name: floor
functions.description: Floor returns the greatest integer value less than or equal to input

functions.name: isNaN
functions.description: IsNaN reports whether input is an IEEE 754 "not-a-number" value

functions.name: mod
functions.description: Mod returns the floating-point remainder of x/y. The magnitude of the result is less than y and its sign agrees with that of x

functions.name: round
functions.description: Round returns the nearest integer, rounding half away from zero

functions.name: roundToEven
functions.description: RoundToEven returns the nearest integer, rounding ties to even

functions.name: trunc
functions.description: Trunc returns the integer value of input
